Articles.Content:
I love this song so much from KSP , Here's my attempt at recreating by ear on my synth.

Hope you enjoy, Orignal is Frost Waltz by Kevin MacLeod

I think that this belongs in the Fan Works section.

That being said, from a guy who learns almost everything he plays by ear (I'm a violinist), this is wonderful! Nice job, looking forwards to hearing more

I also think this belongs in fanworks.

Meanwhile, welcome to the forum, and nice first post.

This. Is awesome. Very well done sir. If you come up with any spacey original stuff, I am in need of soundtracks for my KSP movie (see my description ). I'm a musician myself and I can say that takes skill.
